data.title: Potocki
data.text:
Preface: This preface is an incomplete genealogy just to show the relationships among the branches more fully set out below.

Jakub Potocki (b.ca 1481, d.before 1551); m.1st ca 1515 Katarzyna Jemielnicka (d.after 1544); m.2nd Druzjanna Jazłowiecka (d.after 1570)

1a) [by 1st m.] Mikolaj Potocki, starost and castellan of Kamienitz (b.1517/20, d.1572); m.before 1551 Anna Czermińska (b.ca 1525, d.1579)

1b) Andrzej Potocki, castellan of Kamienitz (1552-1609); m.1st before 1599 Sofia Piasecka; m.2nd Katarzyna Buczacka (d.after 1627)

1c) [by 1st m.]Stanislaw Potocki, Grand Hetman, Voivode of Cracow (1579-1667); m.1st Zofia Kalinowska (d.after 1645); m.2nd 1658/61 Anna Mohylanka (d.ca 1665)

1d) Ct Andrzej Potocki, Feldhetman, Castellan of Cracow, d.1692; m.before 1670 Anna Rysińska (d.1697/1703)

1e) Ct Jozef Potocki, Grand Hetman and castellan of Cracow (d.Zalosce 7 May 1751); m.1st after 1696 Css Wiktoria Leszczyńska (d.1732); m.2nd 1732 Ludwika Mniszech (ca 1712-1785)
